ygData.subject: Re: Silver Ruby Veil
ygData.msgSnippet: I have made 5 so far, sold 4.  Wear it on your face and broadcast every hour a price of 220 to 250pp, It will sell eventually and make more than all of your
ygData.messageBody:
I have made 5 so far, sold 4. Wear it on your face and broadcast every hour
a price of 220 to 250pp, It will sell eventually and make more than all of
your other jewelry sales combined.

Be careful though and look at your connection before clicking that combine
button. The other day I clicked the button and was disconnected a
millisecond after. When I logged back in I was out the components and alas,
no veil. I realize I may have failed and not seen the message but who knows.
I had a 102 skill at the time.

Also, don't get your metals mixed up. If you are making lots of electrum
make darn sure you put a silver bar in your kit. I accidentally put an
electrum bar in and somehow suceeded with my 102 skill. Thank god I suceeded
because if I had failed I might have done the same thing again! That was 5
days ago and I still haven't been able to sell the thing, I'm wearing it
around because it is a *Very* nice item, no matter what your class. Anybody
know a fair price for these? I'm askin 250pp but who knows it may be a little
low.

Orbane
Fenin Ro
